item.description:
A reminder: We'll need to meet on Saturdays over the summer because our host venue, the Button Box, is wisely closed on Sundays between Memorial Day and Labor Day.

With vacations and competition from warm-weather activities, we expect attendance to drop off some in June, July and August. But we'll still schedule regular meetings to play and learn -- and we'll look to ramp back up to full-scale meetings in the fall.

More details to come.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for blonde hair, funky glasses and a black or khaki apron. Oh, and a name tag. That might help identify me, too.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: June NE ATC+ Group Meetup
